description: Mike Trout -- at just 27 years old -- continued to move up the ranks of the all-time greats this past month. Here's why being better than the likes of Ernie Banks and Roberto Alomar is so impressive -- and how he's done it.

description: The Badgers have never landed a quarterback recruit rated as highly as the nation's No. 1 pocket passer, who stuck with Wisconsin despite a national recruiting frenzy.

description: Whether potential trap games or tough tests on the road, here are contests that each top-ranked team, from Clemson to Mississippi State, should watch out for.

title: Roger Federer knows all too well all clay roads lead to Rafael Nadal
description: With the media-billed "Swiss Open" behind him after a four-set win against fellow countryman Stan Wawrinka, Federer now turns to Nadal, the King of Clay.

title: Can the firsts keep coming for Johanna Konta at the French Open?
description: It's been quite some time since a British woman has experienced Grand Slam success equal to Konta's -- and she's not done yet at Roland Garros.

description: The Blues pivot uses a truly unique twig on the ice -- to the bewilderment of onlookers. But it works for him, as evidenced by the two goals he scored in Game 4.

description: A 4-2 victory for St. Louis means this series is going at least six games. Relive Game 4 from every angle here.

description: Every Finals MVP for the past 13 seasons has been wearing sneakers from a Nike-owned brand, a streak that could come to an end this season.

description: Leonard claims he developed the logo himself during his rookie season with the Spurs.

description: A new No. 1 and another few changes at heavyweight. What else has changed in ESPN's boxing divisional rankings?

description: The Tar Heels have chased the ghost that is Dean Smith's coaching legacy. You could argue that they've caught it.

title: Michigan hire, Penny's progress have college basketball's attention
description: Juwan Howard and Penny Hardaway were hired without college coaching experience. The industry is mixed on prospects for long-term success.

title: Former Syracuse star Billy Gabor dead at 97
description: Gabor's No. 17 jersey hangs in the Carrier Dome alongside those of other former Orange greats.

title: Calipari understands son's desire to transfer
description: Kentucky coach John Calipari understands his son's reasoning for entering the transfer portal after graduating in three years. "The ideal thing would be for him to have more of an opportunity here," Calipari said, "but you know ..."

title: Three ex-Oregon players lose appeal of dismissal
description: The dismissal of former Oregon basketball players Dominic Artis, Damyean Dotson and Brandon Austin has been upheld by a U.S. appeals court.

title: Sun Belt scraps 'pod' plan to revamp scheduling
description: The Sun Belt Conference has scrapped its plans to introduce a new "pod" scheduling system, citing a desire to take more time to study the NET rankings and their impact on the league's postseason aspirations.

title: Phil Martelli joins Howard's Michigan staff
description: Martelli spent 34 years with Saint Joseph's before being fired in March.

title: NAU head coach Murphy joins staff at Arizona
description: Northern Arizona men's basketball coach Jack Murphy is leaving the Lumberjacks to become the associate head coach at Arizona, his alma mater.

title: Quinerly transferring from Villanova to Alabama
description: Jahvon Quinerly said Sunday that he's transferring from Villanova to Alabama. Quinerly chose the Crimson Tide over Pittsburgh.

description: Juwan Howard is far from the only prominent ex-player to take over as coach of his former team. Here's a list of notables across sports.

title: Glenville aims to clear player in agent-rule snafu
